hero.description: tBRL is the Brazilian stablecoin 100% backed by BRL that connects Pix to Web3, providing instant liquidity for exchanges, fintechs, digital banks, and global corporations.

whitelabel.description: Launch your own BRL stablecoin — with logo, color, and domain — on top of tBRL's segregated reserve. Perfect for digital banks, marketplaces, and loyalty programs that need on-chain BRL without building the infrastructure from scratch.
whitelabel.bullet.2: Custody and liquidity with enterprise SLA.

faq.subtitle: Get answers about the Brazilian stablecoin that's 100% backed and connects Pix to Web3
faq.footer.line1: tBRL - The Brazilian stablecoin connecting Pix to the blockchain ecosystem
faq.footer.line2: Moonbeam, Polygon, Ethereum, Tron | Operating under CVM Resolution 88
faq.1.q: Is tBRL regulated by the Central Bank?
faq.1.a: The token operates under the backed electronic money model; we follow CVM Resolution 88 and Central Bank guidelines and will be pioneers in complying with any new regulations.
faq.2.a: Pix 24×7 with an average latency of 3 seconds.
faq.3.a: No — as long as there is 100% BRL maintained in the reserve account.
faq.4.a: For volumes < R$ 5k/day we use simplified KYC; above that we apply full KYC/KYB.
faq.6.q: Where can I see the proof of reserves?
faq.6.a: On Fact Finance's website, our balance auditing partner: fact.finance/reserves/tokeniza
faq.7.a: Automated verification of identity, selfie, and liveness — also accessible via API.
faq.8.q: How do I access the services?
faq.8.a: Simple API integration. See the documentation at dev.tbrl.com.br
cta.title: Ready to unlock Brazil
cta.subtitle: Try the sandbox today or schedule a personalized demo with our technical team.
footer.description: The Brazilian stablecoin 100% backed by BRL that connects Pix to the blockchain world, providing instant liquidity with guaranteed backing.
